project(talib)
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0)

include("../../src/CMakeLists_INC.txt")
set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -fPIC")

set(LIB_SRC ta_ACCBANDS.c ta_BETA.c ta_CDLCOUNTERATTACK.c ta_CDLHIKKAKEMOD.c ta_CDLPIERCING.c ta_CEIL.c ta_HT_TRENDLINE.c ta_MAX.c ta_OBV.c ta_SQRT.c ta_ULTOSC.c ta_ACOS.c ta_BOP.c ta_CDLDARKCLOUDCOVER.c ta_CDLHOMINGPIGEON.c ta_CDLRICKSHAWMAN.c ta_CMO.c ta_HT_TRENDMODE.c ta_MAXINDEX.c ta_PLUS_DI.c ta_STDDEV.c ta_utility.c ta_AD.c ta_CCI.c ta_CDLDOJI.c ta_CDLIDENTICAL3CROWS.c ta_CDLRISEFALL3METHODS.c ta_CORREL.c ta_IMI.c ta_MEDPRICE.c ta_PLUS_DM.c ta_STOCH.c ta_VAR.c ta_ADD.c ta_CDL2CROWS.c ta_CDLDOJISTAR.c ta_CDLINNECK.c ta_CDLSEPARATINGLINES.c ta_COS.c ta_KAMA.c ta_MFI.c ta_PPO.c ta_STOCHF.c ta_version.c ta_ADOSC.c ta_CDL3BLACKCROWS.c ta_CDLDRAGONFLYDOJI.c ta_CDLINVERTEDHAMMER.c ta_CDLSHOOTINGSTAR.c ta_COSH.c ta_LINEARREG_ANGLE.c ta_MIDPOINT.c ta_PVI.c ta_STOCHRSI.c ta_WCLPRICE.c ta_ADX.c ta_CDL3INSIDE.c ta_CDLENGULFING.c ta_CDLKICKINGBYLENGTH.c ta_CDLSHORTLINE.c ta_DEMA.c ta_LINEARREG.c ta_MIDPRICE.c ta_retcode.c ta_SUB.c ta_WILLR.c ta_ADXR.c ta_CDL3LINESTRIKE.c ta_CDLEVENINGDOJISTAR.c ta_CDLKICKING.c ta_CDLSPINNINGTOP.c ta_DIV.c ta_LINEARREG_INTERCEPT.c ta_MIN.c ta_ROC.c ta_SUM.c ta_WMA.c ta_APO.c ta_CDL3OUTSIDE.c ta_CDLEVENINGSTAR.c ta_CDLLADDERBOTTOM.c ta_CDLSTALLEDPATTERN.c ta_DX.c ta_LINEARREG_SLOPE.c ta_MININDEX.c ta_ROCP.c ta_T3.c ta_AROON.c ta_CDL3STARSINSOUTH.c ta_CDLGAPSIDESIDEWHITE.c ta_CDLLONGLEGGEDDOJI.c ta_CDLSTICKSANDWICH.c ta_EMA.c ta_LN.c ta_MINMAX.c ta_ROCR100.c ta_TAN.c ta_AROONOSC.c ta_CDL3WHITESOLDIERS.c ta_CDLGRAVESTONEDOJI.c ta_CDLLONGLINE.c ta_CDLTAKURI.c ta_EXP.c ta_LOG10.c ta_MINMAXINDEX.c ta_ROCR.c ta_TANH.c ta_ASIN.c ta_CDLABANDONEDBABY.c ta_CDLHAMMER.c ta_CDLMARUBOZU.c ta_CDLTASUKIGAP.c ta_FLOOR.c ta_MA.c ta_MINUS_DI.c ta_RSI.c ta_TEMA.c ta_ATAN.c ta_CDLADVANCEBLOCK.c ta_CDLHANGINGMAN.c ta_CDLMATCHINGLOW.c ta_CDLTHRUSTING.c ta_global.c ta_MACD.c ta_MINUS_DM.c ta_SAR.c ta_TRANGE.c ta_ATR.c ta_CDLBELTHOLD.c ta_CDLHARAMI.c ta_CDLMATHOLD.c ta_CDLTRISTAR.c ta_HT_DCPERIOD.c ta_MACDEXT.c ta_MOM.c ta_SAREXT.c ta_TRIMA.c ta_AVGDEV.c ta_CDLBREAKAWAY.c ta_CDLHARAMICROSS.c ta_CDLMORNINGDOJISTAR.c ta_CDLUNIQUE3RIVER.c ta_HT_DCPHASE.c ta_MACDFIX.c ta_MULT.c ta_SIN.c ta_TRIX.c ta_AVGPRICE.c ta_CDLCLOSINGMARUBOZU.c ta_CDLHIGHWAVE.c ta_CDLMORNINGSTAR.c ta_CDLUPSIDEGAP2CROWS.c ta_HT_PHASOR.c ta_MAMA.c ta_NATR.c ta_SINH.c ta_TSF.c ta_BBANDS.c ta_CDLCONCEALBABYSWALL.c ta_CDLHIKKAKE.c ta_CDLONNECK.c ta_CDLXSIDEGAP3METHODS.c ta_HT_SINE.c ta_MAVP.c ta_NVI.c ta_SMA.c ta_TYPPRICE.c)

set(LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/../../../bin/)
add_library(talib ${LIB_SRC})
